description: To address CVE-2023-36014, users should update to Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 119.0.2151.58, released on November 9, 2023. This update mitigates the risk associated with remote code execution vulnerabilities. The affected product builds include Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 119.0.2151.58 and its Extended Stable version 118.0.2088.102. Users can check the update and remediation in KB Article KB-119.0.2151.58. It is crucial to ensure that all systems running the affected builds are updated to maintain operational security.
